languages.text: [Шепнуть] "Соломон, мне приятно, что ты хочешь быть подле меня в бою, но к чему такая демонстративность?"
[Whisper] "Solomorne, I am pleased that you wish to be close to me in battle, but why be so blatant about it?"
languages.original_text: [Шепнуть] "Соломон, мне приятно, что ты хочешь быть подле меня в бою, но к чему такая демонстративность?"

traits.locale_text: [Whisper] "Solomorne, I am pleased that you wish to be close to me in battle, but why be so blatant about it?"
[Whisper] "Solomorne, I am pleased that you wish to be close to me in battle, but why be so blatant about it?"
[Whisper] "Solomorne, I am pleased that you wish to be close to me in battle, but why be so blatant about it?"
[Whisper] "Solomorne, I am pleased that you wish to be close to me in battle, but why be so blatant about it?"
[Whisper] "Solomorne, I am pleased that you wish to be close to me in battle, but why be so blatant about it?"

languages.text: [Chuchoter] « Solomorne, je suis {mf|ravi|ravie} que vous vouliez rester près de moi au combat, mais vous pourriez être un peu plus discret. »
languages.original_text: [Whisper] "Solomorne, I am pleased that you wish to be close to me in battle, but why be so blatant about it?"

traits.locale_text: [Chuchoter] « Solomorne, je suis {mf|ravi|ravie} que vous vouliez rester près de moi au combat, mais vous pourriez être un peu plus discret. »

languages.text: [囁く]「ソロモーン、戦場で{mf|俺|私}のそばにいたいと思ってくれるのは嬉しいが、どうしてそんなにあからさまなんだ？」
languages.original_text: [Whisper] "Solomorne, I am pleased that you wish to be close to me in battle, but why be so blatant about it?"

traits.locale_text: [囁く]「ソロモーン、戦場で{mf|俺|私}のそばにいたいと思ってくれるのは嬉しいが、どうしてそんなにあからさまなんだ？」

languages.text: [Susurrar] «Solomorne, me alegro de que quiera estar a mi lado en combate, pero ¿por qué tiene que ser tan evidente?».
languages.original_text: [Whisper] "Solomorne, I am pleased that you wish to be close to me in battle, but why be so blatant about it?"

traits.locale_text: [Susurrar] «Solomorne, me alegro de que quiera estar a mi lado en combate, pero ¿por qué tiene que ser tan evidente?».

languages.text: [低声耳语]“索罗蒙，你希望能在战斗中亲近我，我很开心，但非要这么明目张胆不可吗？”
languages.original_text: [Whisper] "Solomorne, I am pleased that you wish to be close to me in battle, but why be so blatant about it?"

traits.locale_text: [低声耳语]“索罗蒙，你希望能在战斗中亲近我，我很开心，但非要这么明目张胆不可吗？”

languages.text: [Fısılda] "Savaşırken yakınımda olmak istemen çok tatlı Solomorne. Peki neden bunu bu kadar belli ediyorsun?"
languages.original_text: [Whisper] "Solomorne, I am pleased that you wish to be close to me in battle, but why be so blatant about it?"

traits.locale_text: [Fısılda] "Savaşırken yakınımda olmak istemen çok tatlı Solomorne ama neden bu kadar belli ediyorsun?"

languages.text: [Flüstern] "Solomorne, ich freue mich, dass Ihr in der Schlacht in meiner Nähe sein wollt, aber warum so offensichtlich?"
languages.original_text: [Whisper] "Solomorne, I am pleased that you wish to be close to me in battle, but why be so blatant about it?"

traits.locale_text: [Flüstern] "Solomorne, ich freue mich, dass Ihr in der Schlacht in meiner Nähe sein wollt, aber warum so offensichtlich?"
